title: Ranked select for norms
body: Greetings, I am just wondering if the Ranked Lane Select will be going to Norms at all?

replies.body: Probably not. We used to have draft pick normals which was like ranked. It was removed from this server and others if I'm not mistaken. Not sure what riots plans are for the future in regards to normal queue. I wouldn't imagine them doing anything soon anyway.
